column4: My 'window list' on the panel isn't taken up all the available space.  it takes up maybe a fourth of the pane, then starts squeshing itself.  any way to fix this? :x
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4561541#post4561541  <-- I also posted the Q there. :X
you have a separator or invisible widget squeezing it
I guess, if there's no better way to list things
